body: No, this won't work. We have the [information necessary to reproduce the flags in `TracingState`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/tracer_state.h#L68), so it's possible to do right now. I'm fine with merging as is and I can fix that later.
